water consumption
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
Since it is not feasible to provide water consumption data and all the contextual information
needed for 200-300 sites in one report, how should contextual information for 200-300 sites be
provided?
ESRS Reference
ESRS E3 paragraph 28
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 186 of 278
